definition: A set of guidelines or regulations pertaining to cleanliness and sanitary practices, typically followed in specific settings or industries to ensure health and prevent the spread of diseases. It is commonly employed in various professional environments, such as healthcare facilities, food establishments, or manufacturing industries, to maintain hygiene standards and safeguard public health.

examples.german: Die Hygienevorschrift besagt, dass alle Mitarbeiter ihre Hände regelmäßig waschen müssen.
examples.english: The hygiene regulation states that all employees must wash their hands regularly.

examples.german: Die Einhaltung der Hygienevorschrift ist für die Gesundheit der Kunden von großer Bedeutung.
examples.english: Compliance with the hygiene regulation is of great importance for the health of the customers.

examples.german: Die Hygienevorschrift schreibt vor, dass alle Oberflächen regelmäßig desinfiziert werden müssen.
examples.english: The hygiene regulation stipulates that all surfaces must be regularly disinfected.

examples.german: Es ist wichtig, die Hygienevorschriften in Krankenhäusern streng einzuhalten.
examples.english: It is important to strictly adhere to the hygiene regulations in hospitals.

examples.german: Die Hygienevorschrift verbietet das Essen und Trinken im Laborbereich.
examples.english: The hygiene regulation prohibits eating and drinking in the laboratory area.
